movies.title: The Irishman
movies.plot: A mob hitman recalls his friend .

movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: Suicide Squad
movies.plot: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.plot: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
movies.plot: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: Jack Reacher
movies.plot: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
movies.plot: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.
